content: {"name": "United Community Corporation Community Fridge - 39 Broadway ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Refills are made between 10 am to 12 pm, Clients wait in line before refill.", "email": "", "url": "https://uccnewark.org/food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "39 Broadway", "address_2": null, "city": "Newark", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07104", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7514585, "longitude": -74.1703739}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 642-0181", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open 24/7!
